item.title: About
item.description:
Incubation Labs Charter

Status
Name Incubation Labs
Initial Chairs Andor Kesselman, Ankur Banerjee
Status APPROVED
Repo https://github.com/decentralized-identity/incubation-labs

Scope

The Incubation Labs Working Group (ILWG) serves as an incubation environment for decentralized identity-based user applications and spec implementations. The WG provides an IP-safe environment for general implementation-related discussion, and allows participants to propose and participate in WG Work Items, each of which is focused on a user application and/or spec implementation.

item.title: DIF Labs: Decentralized Identity Innovation Group
